Ms. DEAN of Pennsylvania. Mr. Speaker, I thank Representative Marcy  Kaptur and Representative   Mike Quigley for so ably, faithfully, and  loyally co-chairing the Congressional Ukraine Caucus for us and for  bringing us here to the floor tonight to remember how urgent it is that  we support Ukraine…

…unrelenting campaign to weaken our laws and impede  justice, Members of this body have stood up for our Constitution. The  exceptional work of the bipartisan January 6th Committee, ably chaired  by Representative Bennie Thompson of Mississippi, illuminated for the  American people the severity of the conspiracies behind the January 6  attack.
